ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿THE WORLD BANK I BANK DUNIA OFFICIAL -=70om Sharing Development Solutions for an Emerging Indonesia DOCUM ENTS Letter No. CD-280/PSF/VI/2013 June 28, 2013 Mr. Lukita Dinarsyah Tuwo Vice Minister of the National Development Planning as the Chairman of the Board of Trustee Millennium Challenge Account - Indonesia Jalan Subang No. 10 Jakarta Pusat 10310 Dear Mr. Tuwo: Re: Amendment No. I to the Trust Fund Administration Agreement between the Millennium Challenge Account - Indonesia and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development for the Support Facility for National Program for Community Empowerment (PSF) (TFO 70967) 1. We refer to the Trust Fund Administration Agreement, dated April 24, 2013 between the Millennium Challenge Account - Indonesia ("MCA-I" or the "Provider") and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development ("Bank"), acting as administrator of the Support Facility for National Program for Community Empowerment ("PSF"). Capitalized terms used but not defined in this amendment have the meanings given to them in the Administration Agreement. 2. Pursuant to the meeting of the PSF Joint Management Committee on January 22, 2013 endorsing an extension of end of disbursement date, and recent discussion between the Bank and the Provider, the Bank proposes to amend the Administration Agreement as set out in this Amendment (the "Amendment"). 3. Section 8.2 of Annex 2 to the Administration Agreement is amended to reflect the extension of the end disbursement date of the PSF to June 30, 2018 as set out below. "8. Disbursement. Cancellation; Refund 8.2. It is expected that the Allocation funds will be fully disbursed by the Bank in accordance with the provisions of this Trust Fund Administration Agreement by June 30, 2018. The Bank will only disburse Allocation funds for the purposes of this Trust Fund Administration Agreement after such date with the written approval of the Provider." 5. All other terms and conditions of the Administration Agreement remain unchanged. ISEB Tower 2, 12th Floor, JL. Jend. Sudirman Kay. 52-53, Jakarta 12190 a +6221 5299 3000 0 +6221 5299 3111 0 www.worldbank.org/id
ï»¿TF070967 2 of 2 June 28, 2013 6. The Bank will disclose this Agreement and related information on this Trust Fund in accordance with the World Bank Policy on Access to Information. By entering into this Agreement, the Provider consents to disclosure of this Agreement and related information on this Trust Fund. 7. We propose that this letter shall constitute an amendment to the Administration Agreement between the Bank and the Provider. Please confirm your acceptance to the foregoing, on behalf of the Provider, by signing and dating the two originals, retaining one original for your records and returning the other original to the Bank. Upon receipt by the Bank of the original Amendment countersigned by you, this Amendment will become effective as of the date of the countersignature. Sincerely, INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT Josep i I assinette Acting Co try Director, Indonesia CONFIRMED AND AGREED: MILLENNIUM LLENGE ACCOUNT - INDONESIA By: Name: L L4 Vk L4) Title: Cv V or-\ C/t,\I Date: J41 ZO- ISEB Tower 2, 12th Floor, JI. Jend. Sudirman Kay. 52-53, Jakarta 12190 i +6221 5299 3000 * +6221 5299 3111 0 www.worldbank.org/id
